name: Ghosty! (TheEclipsedLock)
description:
The idea that I had here is that you are tricked and fall to your death. However, it's not the end, and you must get a key to be able to move forward.

However, I could not get too far into it and the key and lock mechanism is yet to be finished.

Assets used: Let me list them...

Low Poly Dungeons Lite by JustCreate - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/dungeons/low-poly-dungeons...

Low Poly GHOST by Codewart Game Assets - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/lowpoly-ghost-187863

Low-Poly Simple Nature Pack by JustCreate - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/landscapes/low-poly-simple...

Starter Assets - Third Person Character Controller by Unity Technologies - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/essentials/starter-assets-third-person-cha...

Assets that are there but I never got to use fully:

Stone Frog by BagIdeaStudio - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/stone-frog-18022

Other assets I hoped to use but never implemented:

3D Game Kit - Props Pack by Unity Technologies - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/3d-game-kit-props-pack-135218

Low Poly Free Pack (Samples) - Polyworks https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/low-poly-free-pack-sample-...
